name: MIS National Alerts Report
description: HQ9018 v1.0 This report prompts for one or more alert types and counts the number of prisoners with the selected active alerts for each establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alert
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT <> 'TRN' AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Alert Code and Description:','A','Alerts\Alert Code and Description',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: unknown_parameter
parameters.display: Enter value(s) for Alert Code and Description:
parameters.description: @prompt('Enter value(s) for Alert Code and Description:','A','Alerts\Alert Code and Description',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0)

errors.error: instance.report[0].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child,parent-child-section
